message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split reflects the fact that delays will hurt us both, though I'll be impacted more severely.
Alice, your offer was quite generous, but time is money, especially for you. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Let's close this deal and avoid further losses.
Bob, I understand your position, but your previous offer was too low. This is my final compromise - let's be reasonable and end this here.
